1. Use of these materials requires implementation of either (i) AVS SDK Adapter for Wakeword or Wakeword Lite; or (ii) your own implementation of the AVS SDK Adapter for Wakeword or Wakeword Lite, including sending Wake Word Diagnostics Information (WWDI) or Wakeword detection metadata as a part of the Alexa Service API calls.  Please contact your AVS Solution Architect for more details.
